湘.definition: abbr. for Hunan 湖南 province in south central China; abbr. for Xiangjiang river in Hunan province

湘勇.definition: Hunan army, irregular force formed in 1850s to fight the Taiping heavenly kingdom rebellion

湘妃竹.definition: same as 斑竹[ban1 zhu2], mottled bamboo, since according to legend the spots on mottled bamboo are marks left by the tears shed by two of King Shun's 舜[Shun4] concubines (Ehuang 娥皇[E2 huang2] and Nüying 女英[Nu:3 ying1], known as the Concubines of the Xiang 湘妃[Xiang1 Fei1]) upon learning of his death

湘東.definition: Xiangdong district of Pingxiang city 萍鄉市|萍乡市, Jiangxi

湘東區.definition: Xiangdong district of Pingxiang city 萍鄉市|萍乡市, Jiangxi

湘桂運河.definition: Hunan-Guangxi Canal, another name for Lingqu 靈渠|灵渠[Ling2 qu2], canal in Xing'an County 興安|兴安[Xing1 an1], Guangxi

湘橋.definition: Xiangqiao district of Chaozhou City 潮州市[Chao2 zhou1 Shi4], Guangdong

湘橋區.definition: Xiangqiao District of Chaozhou City 潮州市[Chao2 zhou1 Shi4], Guangdong

湘江.definition: the Xiangjiang river in Hunan province

湘潭市.definition: Xiangtan, prefecture-level city in Hunan Province 湖南省[Hu2nan2 Sheng3]

湘潭縣.definition: Xiangtan county in Xiangtan 湘潭[Xiang1 tan2], Hunan

湘繡.definition: Hunan embroidery, one of the four major traditional styles of Chinese embroidery (the other three being 蘇繡|苏绣[Su1 xiu4], 粵繡|粤绣[Yue4 xiu4] and 蜀繡|蜀绣[Shu3 xiu4])

湘西.definition: see 湘西土家族苗族自治州[Xiang1xi1 Tu3jia1zu2 Miao2zu2 Zi4zhi4zhou1]

湘西土家族苗族自治州.pinyin: xiāng xī tǔ jiā zú miáo zú zì zhì zhōu
湘西土家族苗族自治州.definition: Xiangxi Tujia and Miao Autonomous Prefecture, in Hunan Province 湖南省[Hu2nan2 Sheng3]

湘西州.definition: see 湘西土家族苗族自治州[Xiang1xi1 Tu3jia1zu2 Miao2zu2 Zi4zhi4zhou1]

湘語.definition: Xiang (Hunanese) dialect spoken in Hunan Province

湘軍.definition: Hunan army, irregular force formed in 1850s to fight the Taiping heavenly kingdom rebellion

湘鄉.definition: Xiangxiang, county-level city in Xiangtan 湘潭[Xiang1 tan2], Hunan

湘鄉市.definition: Xiangxiang, county-level city in Xiangtan 湘潭[Xiang1 tan2], Hunan

湘陰.definition: Xiangyin county in Yueyang 岳陽|岳阳[Yue4 yang2], Hunan

湘陰縣.definition: Xiangyin county in Yueyang 岳陽|岳阳[Yue4 yang2], Hunan
